description: Create a new document with specified parameters including dimensions, color mode, resolution, and background fill.

userMessage.error: Document creation failed. Double-check your settings and try again.

params.paramDescription: Background fill type. Possible values: WHITE, BLACK, BACKGROUNDCOLOR, TRANSPARENT, COLOR. Default is WHITE.
Document height in pixels. Default is 600.
Color mode. Possible values: BITMAP, CMYK, GRAYSCALE, RGB. Default is RGB.
Pixel scale factor for high-DPI displays. Default is 1.
Resolution in pixels per inch. Default is 72.
Document width in pixels. Default is 800.

description: Rotate the active document canvas by the specified angle.

userMessage.success: Document has been successfully rotated by the specified angle.
userMessage.error: Unable to rotate document. Please ensure there is an active document and the rotation angle is valid.
userMessage.info: Rotating the canvas by the specified angle

params.paramDescription: Degrees to rotate the canvas. Positive values rotate clockwise. Default is 0 degree.

description: Flip the active document canvas horizontally.

userMessage.success: Document has been successfully flipped horizontally.
userMessage.error: Unable to flip document horizontally. Please ensure there is an active document to flip.

description: Flip the active document canvas vertically.

userMessage.success: Document has been successfully flipped vertically.
userMessage.error: Unable to flip document vertically. Please ensure there is an active document to flip.
Unable to close document. There may be no active document or there was an issue with the closing process.

params.paramDescription: Options for handling unsaved changes when closing. Possible values: SAVECHANGES, DONOTSAVECHANGES, PROMPTTOSAVECHANGES. Default is SAVECHANGES.

description: Set the zoom factor on the active document. Considering the image of 100 by 100, horizontal and vertical in percentage.

userMessage.success: Zoom level has been successfully adjusted to the specified factor.
userMessage.error: Unable to change zoom level. Please ensure there is an active document and the zoom factor is valid.

params.paramDescription: Zoom factor to set (e.g., 200 for 200%, 50 for 50%). Consider initial scale is 100% or 100, and a small zoom should be 10% which would be 110. Default is 0.
Horizontal point where the zoom should be focussed considering image scale of 0 to 100. Default is 50.
Vertical point where the zoom should be focussed considering image scale of 0 to 100. Default is 50.
